extendedInfo.description: This app is designed to keep you in the loop on Rippln news and events and to get you your personal Rippln Invite code if you have not yet created your FREE Rippln account.Download Now and Request Your Exclusive Personal Invite Code From Jason Graber and Join Team Tsunami The #1 Team in Rippln!Great Team Training and Stellar Tools That You Can Use To EXPLODE Your Ripple!We also have The COOLEST Team Contests!!We just added a tab for you to log in to your Rippln account and send invites, and a tab to access our Team Tsunami Training!!This is Not The Official Rippln App!

reviews.title: Problem with app
reviews.comment: I can no longer access this app due content violations from the app itself.  Please fix that.
reviews.author: Jennifer Bristol
